cancer giver, my tumor grows more and more everyday because i am addicted. I cannot express my feelings on how depressed i am because of this game. I have suicidal thoughts everyday, the bomb dial is in my head and i cannot get it out 7355608 is the bomb defuse numbers. Please, if the gods exist, smite the creator of this abomination and you will have my soul for eternity. By the time you read this i am in the tibet mountains with the monks praying, vouching my forever silence and becoming vegan. One day, when i will come back to civilization, bald and skinny as f*ck, i hope this game will turn to ash.
if you love playing with hackers, this is the game to game!
